snippet.title: Haven Park - OUT NOW - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
We're thrilled to present you: Haven Park!

►►► Play Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1549550/Haven_Park/?utm_source=yt_trailer

····················································································

Haven Park is the first game in our newly founded indie publishing label Mooneye Indies! We absolutely fell in love with this cute and wholesome game by solo-dev Fabien Weibel and hope you will too! :) 

Be Flint, who is doing his best to keep his grandma's park up and running and make it a place for the campers to enjoy. Learn their wishes and build whatever their hearts desire to attract even more quirky characters and look forward to whimsical conversations and quests.

Haven Park is available now on PC and Switch!

····················································································

MORE LINKS:

• https://www.havenparkgame.com/
• https://twitter.com/FabienWeibel
• https://twitter.com/MooneyeStudios
• https://www.facebook.com/mooneyestudios/
• https://www.instagram.com/mooneyestudios/

https://www.mooneyestudios.com/
